template.description: Cancel a timer operation initiated with timer.performWithDelay()
template.name: timer.cancel

template.description: Pauses a timer started with timer.performWithDelay.
template.name: timer.pause

template.description: Call a specified function after a delay.
template.name: timer.performWithDelay

template.description: Resumes a timer that was paused with timer.pause.
template.name: timer.resume
